title: The North Star - effect of "Pierces the...night"

content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the effect of the line “Pierces the sable pall of night” (line 2)?

choices.label: Negative diction creates an ominous tone.
The vividness of the verb conveys the star’s power.
Personification emphasizes the human dimension in the poem.
Alliteration highlights a pervasive darkness in the poem.

content.answer: The vividness of the verb conveys the star’s power.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
